response.overview: A (20s, female) who stands in front of a scale every day and goes on a diet 365 days a year due to strong obsession with her appearance. However, A's diet is not a healthy way, but a way to put too much strain on the body by eating food and throwing up. A, who is eating but has an empty stomach, has a strong obsession with food and repeatedly orders delivery food several times a day. Delivery man B (30s, male) delivers food after receiving such repeated orders. She continues her life with difficulty day by day, but she feels more and more exhausted by repeated orders from A. Although they are in the same space, the lives of two people who are starkly different are shown.
response.title: One Day
